bskyang pa dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung

ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams/ bsrung ba dang /

bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba

dang / /bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /

bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang

ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par

gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rom sems su mi byed

pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi

byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/

rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung

bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems

su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems

su mi byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi

lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed

gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/

sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom

sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom

sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan

dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la

mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs

pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid

dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /lho dang nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang /

lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing yang / sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di

skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di la rab 'byor byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/

gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am/

grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces

bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam

par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos

ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba

bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel

par 'byung ba bcings shes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong

pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma

zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs

shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal

zhes bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar

chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /

ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med

ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings shes bya

ba 'am/ grol zhes bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang

dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par

mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston

par mi 'gyur ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur ston nas ji zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag go/ zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro

skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag go/ zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin du rnam

par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go/ zhes bya bar shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin

rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyis

chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go/ zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag go/ zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes

pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad

dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams

cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji

ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes

pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /

kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon

mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam

par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba

med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang

ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs

su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su

dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha'

la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar/ nam

mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod

du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba

ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin

du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul

bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi

'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang

bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/

gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar

'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang /

gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i

ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin

pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas

par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma

dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung

dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che ba dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/

rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /

rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/ /sbyin

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad

rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang /

dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang chung dge dang

tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang / chung che dang tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha'

yas skye mched dang / med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs

rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de la ni

chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/

dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs

su med de rab 'byor rnam grangs nges kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de'i

phyir na pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'o/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/

de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod

par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am/ rnam par ston pa'am/ yongs su ston pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ 'byin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/

'gag par byed pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar byed pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ nang

stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad

med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa

ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rang

byang chub sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos

kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas

kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /rjod do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mud

dang / pund ri ka dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi

'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/

nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin

pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan

lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dpas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par

thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo

rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /

rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo / /

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/

'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor ba'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su

mthong ba'am yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin du mngon par ma grub

pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar

bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang rab tu dgod pa dang gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyi ba dang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de

la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa

rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

rnam par dben pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang

lus med pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams

cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di

ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad

'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

mig yor gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan

ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad

kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi

pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams

cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha

rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs

su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi

pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus

ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di

lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol

du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du

phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i

rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa

dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la

dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du

grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de

dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /

tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog

cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol du phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems

pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i

slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la

ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji

ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs su ma dris so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo

mtshar kyang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi

stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin

no/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjod do/ /kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa

nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /

sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

brtson par bya'o/ /khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa la brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol

du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i

pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de ltar

khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ngo / /kau shi ka 'di la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ /gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang

gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid la mi

gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la

brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la

mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi

tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i

tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ma rig pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor

ba dang / sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha

rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams

dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rnam par thar pa

brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson

par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa

shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang /

gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye

mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas

par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom

pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la

mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i

tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa

yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams

dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par

shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbus su

mi dmigs so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu

rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong

pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams

sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen

po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa
