de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du

phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang

stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu ma dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi

ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngang tshul

can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/

rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen

po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba

ltag la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la

yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang

chub nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de

dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu drug pa'o// //gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang / mtshan ma dang / rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags rnam par bsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag

ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par bsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar

'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can ni sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang / de la sems can dang sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ /

rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin

zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang shin du med la/ byang

chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang / 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang

'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor

go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ sems can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ srog dang 'brel pa ma yin/ skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gso ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/ skyes bu dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin/

shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor

mthong ba po yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa

ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de

ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med

pas/ de'i phyir go che de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de

ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang

shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab

'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma

yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs

par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/

de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis

don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par

mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i

slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin te/

ye shes nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos

so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan

'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom

pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par

bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong

pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni

tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po

dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams

dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa

rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so

so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom

pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang

byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de

bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu

dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shes bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa thams

cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang

chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo

bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /'phags

pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi blta

'am phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i

pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ zhes

yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum pa dang / yongs su zhum par mi

'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dka' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin

nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs te kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul

bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur

yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang ched du 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo

'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/ /gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /

skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / yang

dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la

rtog pa yin/ rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no//

// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin

nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/

skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam

gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams

pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang

stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /

rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs

kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang

du yang ma song / /phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so/ /gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de la ni gang gis

kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas

ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag

rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid dang /

'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ pha rol

du phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /

tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa

med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha

rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad mo dang / ku mud dang / bun da ri ka mang po khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor

ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin

pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dag pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs

dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dad bsam gtan dang tshad med pa

dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam

par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po

dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin

nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing

gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin

nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan

lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden

pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par

thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi

'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa

ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs

rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka'

ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel

bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin

pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags

pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rnam

par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de

bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa

dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa

dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig

pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang /

snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /

rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig

rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag

nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par

rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang mngon par

rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /sems can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed can dang shed bdag dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes

pa po dang mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar

'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi

pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'phags

pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i

chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma

lags mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

pa brgyad gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir

mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi

gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs can no/ /bdag ni tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/ /bdag gi 'du shes so/ /bdag ni 'du shes can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par

shes par bya'o/ /bdag gi skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /bdag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos can no/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag

gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/ /bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /

rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i

'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi dgra

bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin

pa la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam

par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung pa'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad

dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs

pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma

yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang skye mched dang khams

dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /

'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung

ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom

par mi nus so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /nang stong pa nyid

bsgom par mi nus so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang / stobs

rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ste chos 'di ni chos gang rnams dang rjes su 'thun pa lags she na/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni bsam

gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /

chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /

stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad

dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /

chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung

ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /

gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings gnas pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i

dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du

thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang

pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa

brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi

'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /

chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid

thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu

dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying

rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston to/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /

smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di

ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /zhes zer ba ni ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/ ji ltar

de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song pas na/ thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin no/ /de ltar

na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur

ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci la yang

thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med la de bzhin nyid de yang ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du

ma gyur pa yang med de de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med pa de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de

bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa/

dbyer med pa 'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa/ 'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ ji

ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/ de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing rtag tu de bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes bya ste/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis

mnyam pa nyid kyis/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin

nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /

tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin

nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de

bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de

la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na

mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'di ni rab 'byor de bzhin

gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos sa rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to rab tu 'gul to kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go rab tu ldeg go kun tu ldeg go/ /chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur

'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shig go/ /shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/ shar phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho/ /byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs dma' na ni lho

phyogs mtho/ /dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/ dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas

gtor/ mngon par gtor rab tu gtor nas/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /de nas gnas brtan rab

'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar lha'i bu dag gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes

su ma skyes/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma

skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rjes su ma skyes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi

rjes su ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /

tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin

dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las

gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma

skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang / gang rjes su

bskyed pa dang / gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste/ de la

gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i

de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mi

dmigs te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun

dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa

med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti bu de de bzhin no/ /de de

bzhin te de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmigs gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam

par shes pa rnams mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid

thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par

ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta

dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi

mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyam pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems

rnam par grol te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te/ thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan

bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas sbyin pa byin to/ /'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims so/ /bdag gis ni

bsrung bar bya'o/ /'di ni bzod pa'o/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni brtson 'grus so/ /bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan no/ /bdag gis ni mnyam par gzhag par bya'o 'di ni shes rab bo bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ zhes

tha dad par spyod pas de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong / tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog shes rab la goms par byed cing / de dag

'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas tha mi dad pas ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo/

sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam mtshan ma med pa'am smon pa med pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na yang dag pa'i mtha'

mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du 'dra yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang

bral zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du bgyis shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang

smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du bas kyang / thabs mkhas pa la rten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
